overview:
A former nurse, with a passion for helping others caught the startup bug after she met her future husband who is a serial entrepreneur. Soon, domaining, building business plans and gorilla marketing became second nature.

Always faithful as a companion from meet ups to the Startup Alley in New York in May 2012. In June of 2012, after attending many baby showers of friends, planning a wedding, and thinking of starting her own family she had an idea for a startup of her own.

Needing to solve the problem of not knowing which gifts to send, out of town parents who want to be involved, and easy of use for a mother-to-be; Babysbox was born- pun intended.
